document_data.name: Tower of Pizentios
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of Pizentios''' was a singular large spire found on the northeast region of the island of [[Sahu]] in the [[Cities of the Ancients|Ruined Kingdoms]] of [[east Zakhara]] in the early 1400s [[DR]].{{Ne-time}}
document_data.Description:
The Tower was roughly mushroom-shaped, similar to the towers found in the ruins of [[Ereshkigal]] on the opposite side of the island. The Tower was situated near a small lagoon where several storage sheds could be found.

A door in the basement of the Tower led into the [[Underdark]] and the [[Garden of Eternity]].
document_data.History: As its name implied, the Tower was the home of the [[necromancer]] [[Pizentios]] in [[1367 DR]].
